text: A self-disorder is also called an ipseity disturbance. It is a bad change in the minimal self of the person. The minimal self is like a solid center that someone experiences reality with. It can be disturbed in schizophrenia and similar disorders. The self-disorder can show itself in different ways. == Related pages == * Schizotypy * Identity * Psychosis == References == Category:Psychology
title: Self-disorder
